overview:
Micheil Smith has been crafting things from code for the last 6 years. In that time, he has contributed to various open-source projects such as Node.js and Dojo Toolkit, judged in competitions such as The McFarlane Prize for excellence in Australian Web Design and Node.js Knockout.

With a background in JavaScript and Front-end development, and a passion for the realtime web, Micheil joins Pusher as the aussie on the team.
